Posts.Content: luckily I work with a lovely group of ladies who keep.me occupied so in the day I'm actually fine . just yep at night when it's time to try an sleep . thanks you for that in wondered what that was . sounds  a good idea . xx

Posts.Content: strangely enough he told me I had very low estrogen levels (had bloods done ) but that it didn't make sense as I'm not pre menapaulsal.  he said he needed to talk to some other doctors an I had to go back see him next week which is next Tuesday . obviously if I was pre menapaulsal this would make sense with these lumps then ? I guess it's all just wait an see which is the hardest part . thanks you for your reply x

Posts.Title: re refral for lumps

Posts.Content: hello you may remember me a while back I posted about a lump I found and it was a cyst so all was OK.  but I then found another lump in the other breast went back to doc he was horrid . I said I want a re  refral he said why would I when you've just been I said cus it's a new lump in a different breast that wasn't checked . (I only had one breast ultra sound scan ) on the left . he said oh well says in  letter here all I's OK all checked . said yes but my right breast wasn't . I had to really explain myself he was really rude I said it was right to get It checked he said it wasn't . anyway when he finally listened to me he said oh I didn't realise they never scanned the other breast I'm just reading that it says all OK . so he examined me said yes theirs  a lump but we will c if it change's come back in 2 weeks . went back today and got re  examined and they have grown (their is a few lumps  ) so he is sending me back to clinic finally. should I b worried they have grown does this sound like classic fibrocystic if that's right can't remember what he said now  as that's what he thinks they are . I'm 38,  39 next month and it doesn't run in family apart from an ant . many thanks x
Posts.Title: re refral for lumps

Posts.Content: fibrodenoma I think he said just to clarify

Posts.Title: bubble type lump on nipple

Posts.Content: thank you I just haven't told anyone how anxious I am they all just think I'm fine or that I'm. a hypo I don't know . plus obv don't want to worry them with my worrys.  so no one has really said anything to me . so I just carry on like nothing is wrong . I haven't Google much just about lump's and these fibro things my doc thinks they are . just hope in its normal I guess for my age . cane across here an tho great place to say what I can't to others . yes Leo it was you and thanks you . it's just this waiting driving me mad I'm off work now for easter hols so gotta keep busy . x

Posts.Title: my appointment confused

Posts.Content: hello I had my appointment today for lumps in right breast . I had a ultrasound and luckily all was fine . app it's blocked milk ducts which is what im feeling . so I went away like phew OK nothing sinister . but what I don't get now is I thought that was beast feeding mums that get those ? or if your o pregnant i didn't ask any questions I just wanted out of their if I'm honest. im.inalot of pain now prob becasue they have messed about . i know a ultrasound is good way of detecting things but i dont feel 100 per ecnt sastified woth what theyve said an i xant explain why i do feel like a fraud on here as I've not got breast cancer so I hope you don't mind I've posted . plus I wanted others that had messaged me to know how Ito went . I hope the rest of you with same day app are OK xx
